arts.ttl: The lowdown on Crystal Palace 1 Stockport 0 - Eagles secure narrow win in uneventful FA Cup clash
arts.sum: Eberechi Eze scored in the fourth minute as Premier League Crystal Palace knocked out League One side Stockport in the third round of the FA Cup. Stockport had a great chance to equalise in the 11th minute when Isaac Olaofe got past Chadi Riad and crossed along the face of goal for Kyle Wootton, who was unable to turn the cross home.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace boss makes January transfer admission over Blackburn and QPR linked player
arts.sum: “I want to keep the squad together – we don’t have a huge amount of outfield players,” said Glasner. “If he wants to have a change with two or three years on a contract, he will come [and tell me].

arts.ttl: Oliver Glasner: Trevoh Chalobah missed FA Cup clash due to ‘contractual issue’
arts.sum: Chalobah’s absence fuelled rumours the Chelsea loanee could soon be on his way back to his parent club.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace set up League Two clash after Stockport third round win
arts.sum: Crystal Palace boss Oliver Glasner was pleased that his side completed the job of progressing past League One side Stockport to reach the fourth round of the FA Cup. “We had some opportunities but missed the second goal.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace to face Doncaster away in FA Cup fourth round
arts.sum: Crystal Palace will face Doncaster Rovers away in the Emirates FA Cup fourth-round.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace boss explains why Chelsea loanee Trevoh Chalobah was blocked from playing in FA Cup win over Stockport
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner said a ‘contractual issue’ stopped Chelsea loanee Trevoh Chalobah from playing for Crystal Palace in their FA Cup third-round win over Stockport on Sunday. Chalobah was pictured at Selhurst Park on social media and Glasner admitted in his pre-match press conference that the former Ipswich loanee would start against the League One side.
Oliver Glasner said it was a case of ‘job done’ for Crystal Palace after they secured progression to the FA Cup fourth round with a 1-0 win over Stockport County.

arts.ttl: Palace knock out solid Stockport with Eze winner
arts.sum: Watch highlights as Eberechi Eze scores Crystal Palace's only goal to beat Stockport County 1-0 in the third round of the FA Cup.

arts.ttl: Euro giants looking to raid Crystal Palace for 25-year-old star in January
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid and AC Milan are keen on signing the Crystal Palace defender Tyrick Mitchell. The 25-year-old has been linked with a move away from Selhurst Park, with his contract set to expire at the end of the season. Naturally, clubs are looking to secure his services on a free transfer as per reports (h/t […] The post Euro giants looking to raid Crystal Palace for 25-year-old star in January appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Eberechi Eze quick off mark to ease Crystal Palace past Stockport
arts.sum: For Crystal Palace supporters of a certain vintage, any meeting with Stockport is bound to bring back fond memories of Dougie Freedman’s heroics in 2001. More than two decades on from his late goal that ensured Palace avoided relegation to the third tier on the final day of the season and having spent most of the intervening period travelling in different directions, only an early strike from Eberechi Eze could separate Dave Challinor’s side from their Premier League opponents. Oliver Glasner was grateful that Palace’s stand-in goalkeeper Matt Turner – who stepped in after a sickness bug ruled out Dean Henderson – stood firm in the second half as Stockport sniffed the opportunity of an upset.
